article:
One day a young man put an ad   in most of the newspapers in England. He said that his parents gave him millions of pounds  . He graduated from Oxford University. Everyone knows this university is one of the most famous universities in the world. So he had got a great education there. He'd like a girl to be his _ . The girl must be like the one in the books written by Somerset Maugham, _ Maugham was his favourite.
This ad was read and known _ by parents and young girls all over the country. Parents went to shops to look for the books. They bought those books for their daughters  _  presents. Girls tried to get those books  to read  . They wanted to know what kind of person the writer liked so that they could marry the young man.
All the books written by Maugham were sold out in a short time and the writer became famous.
Can you guess who the young man was? It was Somerset Maugham _ ! What a clever man he was!
